111  enum ChannelOrder
112  {
113  Red = 0,
114  Green = 1,
115  Blue = 2,
116  Alpha = 3,
117  Zero = 4,
118  One = 5
119  };

122  struct RefImage
123  {
124  const void *data;
125  int width = 0;
126  int height = 0;
127  int depth = 1;
128  int num_channels = 4;
129  ChannelOrder channel_swizzle[4] = { Red,Green,Blue,Alpha };
130  bool channel_interleave = true;
131  };
